'''Ballad in Goblets''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 1.0]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2020-09-28 10:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2020-10-18 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the 5-star character "Windborne Bard" [[Venti]] ({{Anemo}}) as well as 4-star characters "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}), "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}}), and "Exquisite Delicacy" [[Xiangling]] ({{Pyro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!!
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
